element:
******************************************************************
*                         The Goose Game                         *
* help              - This Menu                                  *
* add player "name" - add a new player to the game               *
* move "name"       - system throws the dice and move the marker *
* move "name" 1, 2  - player throws the dice and move the marker *
* status            - show current standings                     *
* exit              - terminate game                             *
***************++*************************************************
